dotnetType.name: DataContractObjectResolverCase
dotnetType.summary:
A general type resolver case that inspects fields and properties, taking
            <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Serialization" /> attributes into account.

overloads.summary: Creates a new object resolver case.
The binding flags that will be used to select fields and properties.

returns.summary:
An unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result if <paramref name="type" />
            is an array or a primitive type; a successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.RecordResolution" /> result
            otherwise.

overloads.summary: Resolves class, interface, or struct type information.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataContractObjectResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.DataContractResolverCase
